alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Owen; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 01 at 7:44PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EST FOR EAST CENTRAL SWITZERLAND...SOUTHERN KENTON...SOUTHERN CAMPBELL... SOUTHERN BOONE...NORTHERN GRANT...NORTH CENTRAL OWEN...NORTHERN PENDLETON AND EASTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 743 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crittenden, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Independence, Alexandria, Walton, Claryville, Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Butler, Ryland Heights, Glencoe, Patriot, Mentor, Moscow, Visalia, Atwood, Grants Lick, Ryle, Northcutt, Big Bone Lick, Steele Bottom and Bracht. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 61 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 159 and 176. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Campbell; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Owen; Pendleton
